mapper.sql: pk_dorm_id, dorm_building_id, building_levelth, dorm_type, dorm_num, dorm_desc, status, create_time, create_user_id, last_modify_time, last_modify_user_id, memo
mapper.select: SELECT db.dorm_building_num AS dormBuildingNum, d.building_levelth AS buildingLevelth, d.dorm_num AS dormNum, d.dorm_type AS dormType, d.dorm_desc AS dormDesc FROM rm_dorm d LEFT JOIN rm_dorm_building db ON db.pk_dorm_building_id = d.dorm_building_id LEFT JOIN rm_dorm_student_rel dsr ON dsr.dorm_id = d.pk_dorm_id WHERE 1=1 AND dsr.student_id=#{studentId}
